title: BMW Is Giving The 7 Series A Sprinkle Of Elegance
description: The current G70 BMW 7 Series has been on sale since 2022, and that means it's nearly time for a refresh. Spy photographers camped alongside the Nürburgring have spotted the 2027 7 Series LCI (Life Cycle Impulse, or facelift) in the one place no owner will ever take it, and their shots reveal some ...
titleSummary: "BMW Injects Luxury into the Revamped 7 Series with Sophisticated Flair"
descriptionSummary: The BMW 7 Series is due for an update, with a new version expected to arrive soon. Spotted at the Nürburgring, the refreshed model hints at design changes and upgrades for the luxury sedan's next iteration.

title: Ram Is Bringing Back SRT With Two New Performance Trucks
description: Ram is expanding its performance lineup with the launch of two new SRT-badged trucks within the next three months. The announcement was made during Stellantis’ Q3 2025 earnings call, where CEO Antonio Filosa confirmed the move as part of Ram’s ongoing commitment to high-performance models. The ...
titleSummary: "Ram Rekindles High-Octane Fire with Twin Turbocharged SRT Revival"
descriptionSummary: Ram is set to turbocharge its lineup with two new SRT-branded trucks hitting the market within the next quarter. This latest addition underscores the brand's dedication to crafting high-octane vehicles that push the boundaries of performance and capability.

title: We May Not See a True Lexus F Model Anytime Soon
description: Ah, yes, the Lexus F division. It's Japan's answer to Audi RS, BMW M, and Mercedes-AMG. For nearly 20 years, it's been butting heads with some of Europe's finest with, well, varying degrees of success. But regardless, its cars could, at the very least, go toe to toe against its long-established ...
titleSummary: "High-Performance Dreams Delayed: The Future of Lexus' F Series Remains Uncertain"
descriptionSummary: The Lexus F division has carved out a niche for itself as Japan's premier high-performance brand, rivaling European stalwarts like Audi RS, BMW M, and Mercedes-AMG with its own unique take on speed and sophistication.

title: BMW M Is Dropping the Competition Badge — and Manuals Could Be Next
description: The G87 BMW M2 has received neither an all-wheel drive system, despite still reportedly being under consideration, nor a Competition badge, and the latter is simply not going to happen, and that applies to the G90 M5, too. In fact, none of the future cars to come out of the M division will be ...
titleSummary: "BMW's M Division Ditches Competition Label, Manual Gearboxes in Sights for Axing"
descriptionSummary: BMW's M division has ruled out all-wheel drive for its upcoming high-performance models, including the G87 M2 and G90 M5. No Competition trim is in the works, a departure from past practice that will extend across the entire M lineup.

title: SPIED: Mercedes-AMG’s New Electric SUV Has a Spoiler Straight Off a Hypercar
description: It's been nearly two months since Mercedes launched the all-new GLC EQ electric crossover, and now Affalterbach's attention has turned to the AMG variant. Testing is now underway on and around the Nürburgring, where our spies have caught this nearly production-ready prototype, and although a reveal ...
titleSummary: "Mercedes-AMG's Electric Beast Gets Aggressive Makeover with High-Speed Spoiler in Tow"
descriptionSummary: AMG is putting its high-performance stamp on Mercedes' new GLC EQ electric crossover, with testing now under way at the iconic Nürburgring. Spies have snapped images of a near-production-ready prototype in action.

title: Family Sues Tesla Over Fatal Model S Fire, Claiming Doors Trapped Victims Inside
description: Tesla is facing a new wrongful-death lawsuit after a Model S crash in Wisconsin turned deadly, with the victims’ family claiming the car’s electronic door design trapped passengers inside a burning vehicle. According to court filings, Jeffrey and Michelle Bauer were killed when ...
titleSummary: Tesla Blamed in Deadly Crash After Model S Erupts into Flames, Entrapping Passengers
descriptionSummary: A tragic Model S crash in Wisconsin has led to a wrongful-death lawsuit against Tesla, with the victims' loved ones accusing the company's electronic door design of allowing passengers to become trapped in the burning car.

title: Ford Gives The Maverick Mustang Power, And You Can Too
description: Every year, automakers like to show tuning enthusiasts that they can hang with the cool kids at SEMA by modifying one or more of their regular vehicles. The trouble is, these concepts are almost always just that - one-off ideas that will never make their way to the street. But for SEMA 2025, Ford ...
titleSummary: "Unleash Maverick Madness with Ford's Turbocharged Twist on the Iconic Mustang Model"
descriptionSummary: At SEMA, automakers often showcase modified versions of their production cars to prove they can keep up with tuning enthusiasts' high standards. However, these concepts rarely translate into real-world models, but one notable exception could be emerging from Ford's 2025 SEMA offerings.

title: GM Being Sued for Fuel Pump Recall That Didn’t Fix Anything
description: General Motors is being hit with a new class action lawsuit that alleges that the company’s fuel pump recall didn’t repair the root cause of the issue, and didn’t include all the defective vehicles it should have covered. In early 2023, GM issued a recall affecting roughly 23,000 model year 2021 ...
titleSummary: General Motors Faces Class-Action Lawsuit Over Defective Fuel Pump Repairs
descriptionSummary: A class action lawsuit is targeting General Motors over its 2023 fuel pump recall, accusing the company of failing to adequately address the underlying problem and leaving thousands of potentially defective vehicles untouched.

title: The 1,000 HP Hellephant Is Back—And It Costs Less Than You Think
description: The era of high-performance HEMI crate engines is making a comeback. At the 2025 SEMA Show, Stellantis announced the return of its Direct Connection Hellephant A30 426 crate V8—an engine that churns out an insane 1,000 horsepower and 950 lb-ft of torque. Originally unveiled in 2018, the ...
titleSummary: "Meet the Pocket Rocket: 1,000 HP Monster Now More Affordable"
descriptionSummary: High-performance crate engines are experiencing a resurgence, with Stellantis reviving its flagship Direct Connection Hellephant A30 426 V8 for the 2025 SEMA Show. This beastly engine delivers a staggering 1,000 horsepower and 950 lb-ft of torque.

title: Toyota Could Break Tradition With a Unibody Land Cruiser and Electric Power
description: Over the last seven decades, the Toyota Land Cruiser has built a reputation as a supremely capable off-roader, however, this may change in the near future. Japanese auto publication Best Car has reported that Toyota may soon ditch the traditional body-on-frame architecture in favor of an all-new ...
titleSummary: "Shaking the Off-Road Roots: Toyota's Radical New Take on the Legendary Land Cruiser"
descriptionSummary: A legendary off-road icon is poised for a significant overhaul. Toyota's venerable Land Cruiser may be on the cusp of a major design shift, as the company considers abandoning its rugged body-on-frame construction for a more modern approach.

title: World’s First Wirelessly Charging Highway Is Here — More Powerful Than Tesla Superchargers
description: While we have seen static wireless charging gain momentum with varying degrees of success, dynamic charging is where things start to look really futuristic. Charging your EV as it drives along the highway may feel dystopian today, but several brilliant minds have been at it for years trying to make ...
titleSummary: "Electric Road Revolution: High-Speed Wireless Charging Hits the Open Road Nationwide"
descriptionSummary: The future of electric vehicle charging has arrived in the form of dynamic wireless technology. Pioneers in the field are making rapid progress on systems that can recharge cars while they're in motion, bringing a seamless and futuristic driving experience within reach.

title: Subaru’s EV Sales Hit Rock Bottom in October
description: We came away from our first drive of the 2026 Subaru Solterra EV impressed by the changes that had been made to the crossover. From more range to a newly designed dashboard, it’s clearly an improvement over the pre-facelift model. Earlier this year, sales of the EV appeared to be moving in the ...
titleSummary: Subaru's Electric Car Sales Plummet to Record Low in October Slump
descriptionSummary: Our initial test drive of the revamped 2026 Subaru Solterra EV left us impressed by its upgrades, including increased range and a fresh, redesigned interior. The updates hint at a significant leap forward from its predecessor.

title: 2026 Lexus RZ Arrives With Smarter Tech, Easier Charging, and New Perks for EV Owners
description: Lexus has officially opened sales of the 2026 RZ, unveiling a suite of convenience updates and a major expansion to its charging ecosystem for all brand BEV owners. The refreshed RZ now includes the North American Charging Standard (NACS) port as standard, giving drivers access to ...
titleSummary: "2026 Lexus RZ Boasts Advanced Features, Simplified Charging, and EV Enhancements"
descriptionSummary: Lexus has launched sales of the 2026 RZ, introducing enhanced convenience features and a broader EV charging network for its BEV customers. The updated RZ boasts seamless NACS integration, streamlining electric driving across North America.

title: 1984 Corvette C4 For Sale With 277 Miles Is The First One Ever Built
description: The very first production-numbered 1984 Chevrolet Corvette (VIN 0001) is now headed to auction, giving collectors a rare chance to own the car that launched the C4 era. This milestone Corvette, finished in white over red leather, represents a turning point in the model’s history, the ...
titleSummary: "Low-Mileage Rarity: 1984 Corvette C4 Emerges with a Whopping 277 Original Miles"
descriptionSummary: A historic milestone is up for grabs as VIN 0001, the first production 1984 Chevrolet Corvette, hits the auction block. This iconic car marks the beginning of the C4 era and offers a unique opportunity to own a piece of automotive heritage. Finished in crisp white with bold red leather, it's a true collector's dream come true.

title: 2026 BMW iX Gets Tempting Lease Deals This November
description: Making its world premiere in mid-2021, it could be said that the BMW iX is Bavaria's first serious attempt at a volume-selling electric vehicle. Sure, there was the BMW i3, but that was more of a range-extended electric vehicle than a pure EV. It rides on a dedicated carbon platform, and it's ...
titleSummary: "BMW's Electric SUV Scores Attractive Leasing Offers for November Buyers"
descriptionSummary: BMW is poised to make a splash in the mass market with its inaugural electric flagship, the BMW iX, which debuts in mid-2021. A significant departure from previous efforts like the i3, this new model boasts a purpose-built carbon structure.

title: The Mazda 3 is in Trouble: Plummeting Sales, Tariffs, and Age Take a Toll
description: Mazda North America has just released its October sales results, and it’s bad news for the company’s compact 3 Sedan and 3 Hatchback. Renowned for its premium interior, stylish design, and enjoyable driving dynamics, the Mazda 3 is still an excellent choice in its class, but it now faces a triad of ...
titleSummary: "Trouble Hits Mazda's Best-Seller: Sales Slump Amid Trade Headwinds and Aging Model"
descriptionSummary: Mazda's latest sales figures reveal a slight dip in demand for its compact 3 Sedan and Hatchback models. Despite its reputation for luxurious interiors and agile handling, these popular variants are facing increased competition from rival vehicles in their segment.

title: Dodge Brings Back Nostalgic Option For V8-Powered Durango SUV
description: The Dodge Durango is the rebel of the three-row SUV segment. There simply isn’t another vehicle of this kind with the Durango’s attitude and intense focus on performance—every Durango now has a V8 engine and the range is still topped by the outrageous Hellcat, with its 710-horsepower supercharged ...
titleSummary: "Dodge Revives Iconic Power for 2024 Durango V8 Model"
descriptionSummary: In a class of its own, the Dodge Durango stands out as an unapologetic thrill-seeker. Every model boasts a potent V8 engine, capped by the show-stopping Hellcat, which unleashes 710 horsepower on demand.

title: Audi Q9 Officially (and Quietly) Confirmed for 2026 Debut
description: We wouldn't call the Audi Q7 small by any means. At about 200 inches long, it can easily handle a family holiday or a quick dash run to the nearest Costco. That said, if there's room for expansion, Audi will gladly occupy that space. After all, that's how we've ended up with a whole battalion of ...
titleSummary: Audi's Long-Awaited Luxury SUV Set to Roar into Market in 2026
descriptionSummary: The Audi Q7 is certainly not pint-sized, boasting a substantial 200-inch length that makes it well-suited for family vacations or spontaneous trips to the store. Its spacious interior invites owners to customize and expand as needed.

title: Lemonade Thinks Tesla Full Self Driving Is So Good It Wants To Offer Free Auto Insurance
description: Tesla's Full Self-Driving (FSD), which is currently only available in “supervised” mode, may soon gain a new advantage over competitors. Lemonade, a company that brands itself as an “insurance company built for the 21st century,” is proposing that Teslas with FSD should be insured for free. Its ...
titleSummary: "Lemonade Sees Tesla's FSD as Too Safe for Its Own Insurance Business to Compete"
descriptionSummary: Lemonade, a forward-thinking insurance provider, is contemplating a game-changing offer: providing complimentary coverage to Tesla owners equipped with its Full Self-Driving technology in supervised mode. This innovative approach could give Teslas a significant edge over rivals.

title: Hyundai Ioniq 3 Spied as the Electric Successor to the Veloster
description: The Hyundai Veloster lived a relatively short life, only being produced from 2011-2022, but now, it's being reincarnated in electric form and with a new name. Spy photographers have captured the upcoming Ioniq 3 in Europe, and its profile is certainly similar to that of the oddball Veloster. This ...
titleSummary: "Veloster's Electrifying Heir: Hyundai Ioniq 3 Spotted in Latest Test Runs"
descriptionSummary: The Hyundai Veloster's brief production run may be over, but its legacy lives on in the form of an all-new electric model, now rebranded with a sleek new identity. Spotted abroad, this vehicle shares a familiar silhouette with its predecessor.

title: Toyota Confirms New Twin-Turbo Hybrid V8 Engine for Future Performance Cars
description: At the Japan Mobility Show, Toyota unveiled a new twin-turbo hybrid V8 engine that could anchor its next-generation high-performance vehicles. While Lexus captured attention with its Sport Concept, along with a six-wheeled LS minivan, Toyota’s powertrain reveal hinted at broader ambitions for both ...
titleSummary: "Power Surge: Toyota Unveils High-Performance Twin-Turbo Hybrid V8 for Future Lineup"
descriptionSummary: At the Japan Mobility Show, Toyota made a significant splash by unveiling a cutting-edge twin-turbo hybrid V8 engine that could serve as the foundation for its future high-performance models.

title: The Most Expensive Dodge Durango Hellcat Shows How Close It Gets to a Luxury SUV
description: The 2025 Dodge Durango SRT Hellcat Jailbreak already occupies rare territory: a three-row performance SUV armed with 710 horsepower and a supercharged V8. It begins at $81,585, a figure that almost undersells its purpose. This is a family hauler engineered to outperform sports cars, tow boats, and ...
titleSummary: "High-Performance Punch in an Upscale Package: Meet the Priciest Dodge Durango Yet"
descriptionSummary: Meet the Dodge Durango SRT Hellcat Jailbreak, a high-performance SUV that defies convention with 710 horsepower and a supercharged V8 engine. Its $81,585 price tag hints at its true capabilities: a family hauler that can outmuscle sports cars and tow with ease.

title: Germany’s Auto Industry Faces 200,000 Job Cuts Amid EV Shift
description: Germany’s once-dominant automotive sector is facing its harshest reckoning in decades. Analysts and trade groups warn that up to 200,000 jobs could disappear over the next few years as the country’s carmakers struggle with falling demand, high production costs, and the painful transition ...
titleSummary: "Germany's Car Makers Prepare for Devastating Wave of Layoffs in Electric Vehicle Era"
descriptionSummary: Germany's storied automotive industry is grappling with its most severe crisis in recent history. Widespread job losses are predicted, potentially exceeding 200,000, as struggling manufacturers face declining sales, rising costs, and a challenging shift towards sustainability.

title: Toyota Turns Tacoma Into 547-HP Hydrogen-Powered Off-Roader
description: Toyota’s hydrogen journey hit a snag recently. Owners of the hydrogen-fuel-cell sedan, the Mirai, have sued the Japanese automaker for misleading them about the availability of the required charging infrastructure to keep the sedan fueled up. That isn’t stopping Toyota from pursuing new hydrogen ...
titleSummary: "Tacoma Transformed: Toyota Unleashes 547-HP Hydrogen-Fueled Beast of the Backcountry"
descriptionSummary: A recent setback has sparked controversy surrounding Toyota's hydrogen-powered Mirai sedan. Owners are taking action against the company, alleging that they were misled about the availability of fueling stations. Undeterred, Toyota is pushing forward with its hydrogen ambitions.

title: Ford Issues Three Recalls In A Single Day
description: Ford continues to be plagued by problems as 2025 draws to a close, with three new recalls being issued by the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration in a single day. The first affects the 2017-2019 Ford Flex, after the NHTSA's investigation into detaching B-pillar door trim has now ...
titleSummary: Ford Hits Triple Recall in One Sweltering Summer Day's Shockwave
descriptionSummary: As the year winds down, Ford faces another setback with the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration issuing three recalls within one day, including a critical notice for certain 2017-2019 Ford Flex models due to a risk of loose door trim.

title: Meet The World's First Modern Defender Pickup
description: The original Land Rover Defender was an icon, and its contemporary successor is proving just as popular, including in the restomod scene. After revealing a modern Defender with a soft-top at this year's Goodwood Festival of Speed, Urban Automotive, in partnership with Heritage Customs, has now ...
titleSummary: "Land Rover Unveils Futuristic Take on Classic Pickup Truck Legacy"
descriptionSummary: The reborn Land Rover Defender continues to captivate enthusiasts, both old and new. Building on its storied legacy, Urban Automotive and Heritage Customs have unveiled a sleek, modern Defender convertible, sparking excitement among restomod aficionados at the 2023 Goodwood Festival of Speed.

title: Engine Teardown Exposes What Nearly Destroyed This 90,000-Mile Hemi V8
description: Late-night Facebook Marketplace hunts often blur the line between great deals and regrettable decisions. For one, our favorite engine teardown specialist, I Do Cars, led to an $850 6.4-liter Hemi V8 from a 2018 Dodge Durango SRT. The price was suspiciously low – cheap enough to make any gearhead ...
titleSummary: "Decade-Old Secrets Revealed in Gutting of High-Mileage Hemi V8 Powerhouse"
descriptionSummary: A midnight Facebook Marketplace search can be a double-edged sword, where exciting finds often walk hand-in-hand with buyer's remorse. Take the case of I Do Cars' discovery: an $850 6.4-liter Hemi V8 from a rare 2018 Dodge Durango SRT.

title: Lucid Responds After Shocking Lease Fees Anger Customers
description: Leasing a new car offers several advantages, such as the potential for lower monthly costs and the chance to drive a nicer, more upscale vehicle. However, one pitfall involves the potentially prohibitive costs associated with wear and tear at the conclusion of the lease period. Although your leased ...
titleSummary: "Fury Over Hidden Charges Sparks Backlash Against Lucid Motors"
descriptionSummary: Driving off the lot in a brand-new car can be a thrilling experience, but it's essential to consider the potential drawbacks, including hefty fees for wear and tear when the lease comes to an end, which could offset initial cost savings.

title: Cadillac Secretly Made The Escalade-V Quieter For 2025, But It'll Still Wake The Neighbors
description: When General Motors decided to shove a 6.2-liter supercharged V8 into its three-row SUV to create the Escalade-V back in 2023, the resulting creation was so loud that anybody who bought one seemed likely to receive noise complaints from their neighbors... in the adjacent county. But for 2025, the ...
titleSummary: Cadillac Tones Down the Beastly Escalade-V for a Softer New Year
descriptionSummary: The behemoth Escalade-V has a newfound reputation for civility. Gone are the ear-shattering days of its thunderous V8 engine, now muffled in favor of a more subdued roar.

title: LEAKED: Toyota Prepares to Launch Electric Pickup
description: Toyota’s most popular pickup is finally going electric, or at least that’s what a leaked internal presentation slide seems to confirm. Shared with regional media during a private briefing in Asia and then on Instagram, the image clearly shows the silhouette of a Hilux BEV alongside Toyota’s ...
titleSummary: "Shock in the Garage: Toyota's Secret EV Pickup Finally Hits the Road"
descriptionSummary: A leaked document has reportedly revealed plans for an electrified version of Toyota's best-selling pickup truck, which is set to debut in the region following a private briefing with Asian media.

title: Elon Musk Promises ‘Crazy’ Tesla Roadster Tech — Could It Really Fly?
description: Elon Musk is once again talking about flying cars, and this time, he insists it’s not science fiction. During a recent podcast appearance, the Tesla CEO hinted that the long-delayed Tesla Roadster will feature what he called “crazy technology,” suggesting the upcoming model could ...
titleSummary: "Musk Teases Revolutionary New Tesla Design, But Can it Take to the Skies?"
descriptionSummary: Tesla's Elon Musk is reviving his vision for airborne transportation, assuring it's not pure fantasy. In a recent podcast chat, he teased that the next-generation Tesla Roadster will boast cutting-edge tech that could transform the driving experience.

title: Scout Buyers Love EVs — But 80% Still Chose the One With a Gas Engine
description: Volkswagen’s revival of the Scout brand has received a mostly warm reception, even though the upcoming Terra pickup and Traveler SUV will stick with electric power—as opposed to the large Sixes and V8s of the old-school Scouts. Production of the new Scouts is expected to begin in 2027, but ...
titleSummary: "Electric Vehicles Spark Interest, but Traditional Fueled Cars Remain Top Choice Among Car Shoppers"
descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's rebirth of the iconic Scout brand has generated excitement among fans, who are eager to see the revival take shape despite a departure from the traditional gas-guzzling engines that defined its predecessors. Production is slated for 2027.

title: Mazda’s First Born-EV Is Coming in 2027 — and It Promises Classic Mazda Feel
description: Mazda isn’t necessarily a major player in the born-EV space. While the MX-30 is a lovely little electric crossover, its underpinnings are mostly derived from the gas-powered CX-30. You could say the same for the Mazda EZ-6 and the EZ-60, as both cars feature platforms made by Changan—Mazda’s ...
titleSummary: "Mazda's Revival: Electrified Elegance Returns with the Brand's First Pure-Bred EV"
descriptionSummary: Mazda's electric vehicle offerings currently trail behind those of its competitors, with models like the MX-30 leveraging existing gas-powered platform designs, such as that used in the CX-30.

title: Ford Has A Plan To Thwart A Lagging EV Market
description: Despite a disappointing earnings call, Ford stock was up ten percent on Friday morning. Investors are pouring money into the automaker, which saw over $1 billion in losses on EVs, prompting the company to reduce its 2025 EBIT forecast by $1 billion, too. Ford also faces issues with its relationship ...
titleSummary: Ford Unveils Ambitious Strategy to Revitalize Failing Electric Vehicle Sales
descriptionSummary: Ford's shares surged ten percent on a volatile Friday morning, despite a lackluster earnings report that revealed significant investments and major setbacks, including a nearly billion-dollar EV loss and a revised 2025 profit forecast.

title: Meet the Ioniq 9 BigTime — Hyundai’s Boldest EV Yet Hits the Dirt
description: SEMA is quite the place for automakers to show off their wild projects. Nissan is readying its Dune Patrol concept—an Armada-based adventure support vehicle, while Toyota gave its Corolla Cross a whole lot of off-road TLC with the Nasu Edition. Hyundai is planning something big for SEMA—quite ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai's Electric Dream Machine Roars to Life in the Ioniq 9 BigTime"
descriptionSummary: At SEMA, automakers showcase their boldest creations. Nissan's Dune Patrol takes center stage, built on an Armada platform as an adventurous support vehicle. Meanwhile, Toyota's ruggedized Corolla Cross, the Nasu Edition, gets ready to tackle tough terrain alongside Hyundai's upcoming SEMA surprise.

title: America’s Most Stolen Cars – Is Yours at Risk?
description: The good news is that the pandemic-fuelled peak in car thefts is well on its way to pre-pandemic levels. Data from the National Insurance Crime Bureau (NICB) shows a 23% decrease in vehicle thefts in the United States for the first half of 2025. NICB reports that this could make it the second year ...
titleSummary: "Stealing America's Wheels: Top Targets and How to Protect Your Ride"
descriptionSummary: Vehicle theft rates are steadily returning to normal after surging during the pandemic, according to recent data from the National Insurance Crime Bureau. The US saw a significant 23% drop in auto thefts for the first half of 2025, a promising trend that may signal a full recovery by year's end.

title: Hyundai And Kia’s EV Sales Collapsed In October—Expect More Pain Ahead
description: Well, we knew it was coming. High EV sales in the third quarter were largely the result of consumers trying to take advantage of the federal tax credit, which fell away at the end of September in the United States. Industry analysts warned that a sharp decline in EV sales would follow, and based on ...
titleSummary: "Hyundai and Kia's Electric Vehicle Sales Plummet in October, Setting a Troubling Precedent"
descriptionSummary: As expected, third-quarter electric vehicle (EV) sales surged before the expiration of the US federal tax incentive, now gone by October 1st. Analysts predicted a significant drop-off to follow, and the numbers seem to be confirming that prediction.

title: Honda Refuses to Share S2000 Revival With Another Brand
description: Last sold in America for the 2009 model year, the Honda S2000 was a thoroughly engaging roadster with a rev-happy four-cylinder engine and entertaining rear-wheel-drive handling dynamics. There has been no successor to the S2000, which is why values of used examples are high today. But could the ...
titleSummary: Honda Keeps Exclusive Ownership of Fabled S2000 Roadster's Future Plans
descriptionSummary: The Honda S2000, discontinued in the US after 2009, was a fan-favorite roadster with a spirited inline-four engine and razor-sharp handling. Its absence has fueled interest in remaining examples, driving up prices among enthusiasts.

title: The HEMI-Powered Dodge Charger Lives—But There's a Catch
description: When the Dodge Charger was revived 20(!) years ago, one can say that there was some initial backlash on the basis that it had two more doors than the original. Of course, that criticism has since faded, partly helped by the slew of performance models that came and went.  The word HEMI has ...
titleSummary: "Hemi Heaven Revived: Dodge Charger Gets Boost, But With Strings Attached"
descriptionSummary: When the Dodge Charger returned to the market 20 years ago, some fans were skeptical about its new four-door design. However, this criticism dissipated as high-performance variants revitalized the model and solidified its place in American muscle car history.

title: 1995 Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution III For Sale With 66,400 Miles — Your Shortcut to a ’90s JDM Legend
description: Mitsubishi Lancer Evolutions are some of the most sought-after JDM performance cars – a turbocharged, all-wheel-drive weapon compact sports sedan homologated for road use. But not all Evos were sold in the States. That said, thanks to the 25-year rule, you can import a right-hand drive example ...
titleSummary: "Rare '95 JDM Beast Hits Market with Tame Mileage for the Price of a Dream"
descriptionSummary: The Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution is a highly coveted performance car that combines turbocharged power with all-wheel-drive capability. Originally designed for the global market, these rare cars are now accessible for US enthusiasts through specialized imports.
